A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Really disappointed in this one\, had some awesome moments (that silent one for sure) but it mostly felt very all over the place and like episode 5 and 6 combined. barely any major gun fights\, too many moments ruined by tastless comedy and one liners\, some pretty bad cgi on that force ghost (not naming for sake of spoilers) and overall unconvincing story and predictable sequences. Rough One was way better if you think this was ever gonna top it.
